§ Solidity (Programming Language)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The **Solidity programming-language** is a [[programming-language]] for writing //smart-contracts// on the [[ethereum]] [[blockchain-network]], and other Ethereum-compatible blockchain-networks compatible with ethereum, such as
[[arbitrum-network]],
[[avalanche-network]],
[[base-network]],
[[berachain]],
[[cyber-network]],
[[optimism-network]],
[[polygon-network]],
and others.
